Affixes.Name: FierceBrawler_1
Affixes.Description: Attack speed is increased by #amount% while using one-handed weapons.

Affixes.Name: FierceBrawler_2
Affixes.Description: Critical strike damage increased by #amount% while using two-handed weapons.

Affixes.Name: DefyPain
Affixes.Description: When you evade, gain #amount% damage reduction for #duration second.

Affixes.Name: BloodThirst
Affixes.Description: Enemies bleed for #amount% of your critical strike damage over 5 seconds

Affixes.Name: QuickImpulses
Affixes.Description: While moving, your damage reduction is increased by #amount%.

Affixes.Name: SlayingStrike
Affixes.Description: Damage is increased by #amount% against enemies below 30% life.

Affixes.Name: CutToTheBone
Affixes.Description: Stunning an enemy increases bleeding on them by #amount% for 3 seconds.

Affixes.Name: BattleFrenzy
Affixes.Description: Using a Brawling skill grants Berserk for #duration second.

Affixes.Name: Momentum
Affixes.Description: 20% chance to generate #amount fury on hit.

Affixes.Name: UnstoppableForce
Affixes.Description: Berserking grants Unstoppable and #amount% increased damage.

Affixes.Name: ConditionTest_DefenseWhileUsingOneHander
Affixes.Description: #roll to Defense while using one handed weapons.

Affixes.Name: TemplateReducedManaCost
Affixes.Description: #roll% Reduced Mana Cost for Skills (Sorcerer Only)

Affixes.Name: ChestDamageReductionFromRanged
Affixes.Description: #roll% Damage Reduction from Enemies out of Melee Range

Affixes.Name: AmuletReducedFuryCost
Affixes.Description: #roll% reduced Fury Cost for skills (Barbarian Only)

Affixes.Name: TemplateReducedCcDuration
Affixes.Description: #roll% Reduced Duration of Enemy Control Impairing Effects

Affixes.Name: TemplateReducedFuryCost
Affixes.Description: #roll% Reduced Fury Cost for Skills (Barbarian Only)

Affixes.Name: TemplateReducedSpiritCost
Affixes.Description: #roll% Reduced Spirit Cost for Skills (Druid Only)

Skills.Name: Bash
Skills.Description:
Bash the enemy with your weapon, dealing #Min; - #Max;.  

Has a #StunChance;% chance to stun for #StunDuration; seconds.
Skills.NextRank: #Min; - #Max; damage, #StunChance;% chance to stun for #StunDuration; seconds.

Skills.Name: ChallengingShout
Skills.Description: Fortify yourself for #FortifyAmount; and taunt nearby enemies for #Duration; seconds.  During this time, you generate #FuryOnHit; when hit.

Skills.Name: Charge
Skills.Description: Rush forward and push enemies with you, then swing through them for #Min; - #Max;.

Skills.Name: CallOfTheAncients
Skills.Description: Call upon the Ancients to aid you in battle for #Duration; seconds.

Skills.Name: DeathBlow
Skills.Description:
Attempt a killing strike, dealing #Min; - #Max; to enemies in front of you.  If this kills an enemy, the cooldown is reset.

Requires a two-handed slashing weapon.

Skills.Name: DoubleSwing
Skills.Description:
Sweep your weapons from opposite directions, dealing #Min; - #Max; with each weapon.  Enemies caught in the center are hit by both.

Requires dual wielded weapons.

Skills.Name: Flay
Skills.Description: Flay the enemy, dealing #Min; - #Max; and inflicting #BleedDamage; bleeding over #BleedDuration; seconds.

Skills.Name: Frenzy
Skills.Description:
Unleash a rapid flurry of blows, dealing #Min; - #Max; with each pair of hits.  

Your attack speed is increased by #IncreasedAttackSpeed;% for #IncreasedAttackSpeedDuration; seconds, up to #IncreasedAttackSpeedMaximum;%.
Skills.NextRank: #Min; - #Max; damage, #IncreasedAttackSpeed;% attack speed for #IncreasedAttackSpeedDuration; seconds, up to #IncreasedAttackSpeedMaximum;%

Skills.Name: GroundStomp
Skills.Description: Smash the ground, stunning nearby enemies for #Duration; seconds.

Skills.Name: HammerOfTheAncients
Skills.Description: Slam your hammer down with the fury of the Ancients, dealing #Min; - #Max; to a concentrated area.

Skills.Name: IronMaelstrom
Skills.Description:
Whirl your weapon around on a chain, continually dealing #Min; - #Max;.

Requires a two-handed weapon.

Skills.Name: Kick
Skills.Description: Kick an enemy for #Min; - #Max; and knock them backwards.  On collision, enemies in the area take an additional #Min2; - #Max2;.

Skills.Name: Leap
Skills.Description: Leap forward and slam downward, dealing #Min; - #Max; on impact.

Skills.Name: LungingStrike
Skills.Description: Lunge forward and strike an enemy for #Min; - #Max;

Skills.Name: PrimalAxe
Skills.Description: Throw your weapon with a chain attached, dealing #Min; - #Max; and pulling in enemies.

Skills.Name: RallyingCry
Skills.Description: Bellow a rallying cry, granting all allies Unstoppable, #IncreasedMovementSpeed;, and #DamageReduction; for #Duration; seconds.

Skills.Name: Rend
Skills.Description: Cleave enemies in front of you, dealing #Min; - #Max; and inflicting #BleedDamage; bleeding over #BleedDuration; seconds.

Skills.Name: Rupture
Skills.Description:
Skewer enemies in a line, inflicting #BleedDamage; over #BleedDuration; seconds.  If an enemy dies while bleeding, the cooldown is reset.

Requires a two-handed slashing weapon.

Skills.Name: UndyingRage
Skills.Description:
When you take fatal damage, you have #Duration; seconds to fight for your life before you die.  Killing an enemy in time will revive and heal you for #HealAmount;.

This effect can only occur once every #Cooldown; minutes.

Skills.Name: Upheaval
Skills.Description:
Tear into the ground with your weapon and fling debris forward, dealing #Min; - #Max;.

Requires a two-handed weapon.

Skills.Name: WarCry
Skills.Description: Bellow a mighty war cry.  You and nearby allies deal #IncreasedDamage;% increased damage per nearby enemy for #Duration; seconds, up to #IncreasedDamageMax;.

Skills.Name: Whirlwind
Skills.Description: Rapidly attack nearby enemies for #Min; - #Max;.

Skills.Name: WrathOfTheBerserker
Skills.Description: Go Berserk for #Duration; seconds.  Every #FurySpent; Fury you spend increases the effects by #IncreasedEffect;%.
